All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class DateField
extends DataField

A subclass of DataField for the input and display of dates.

Since:
Kiwi 1.4
Author:
Mark Lindner
See Also:
Serialized Form

          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Construct a new DateField with the specified width and date format.

Parameters:
width - The width of the field.
format - The date format.
Method Detail

getDate

public java.util.Date getDate()
Parse the contents of the field as a date, and return the date.

Returns:
The parsed date, or null if parsing failed.

setDate

public void setDate(java.util.Date date)
Set the data to be displayed by this field. The date is formatted as a string, according to the rules of the current locale, and displayed in the field. Invalid input flagging is automatically turned off.

checkInput

protected boolean checkInput()
Determine if the given input is valid for this field.

Overrides:
checkInput in class DataField
Returns:
true if the input is valid, and false otherwise.

                  throws java.text.ParseException
Throws:
java.text.ParseException
